The grant announcement was posted on Jun: 2020, on a Facebook page called "South Sudan ministry of finance and planning" claiming that the South Sudanese government is handing out grants worth $41.4 million to entrepreneurs and farmers.
The post includes an application linked: which asks people for their personal information and information about their businesses.
The South Sudanese finance ministry issu: 2020, denying the existence of any such grant and dismissing it as the work of hackers. The ministry urged the public to be vigilant and disregard the information circulating on social media as fake.
